short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects up to 3 languages and their percentages of the provided string

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pickrey Detector is a simple and easy-to-use extension, with the help of this extension you can easily detect languages with the matching percentage of given words.
You can contact us through https://pickrey.com/

Pickrey is a very fast and reliable extension for language detection. 

What exactly a Extension is? extensions are a set of software codes that can modify and enhance the functionality of the browser.

It is very easy to write your first extension. How??? Well, it all exactly requires is a basic knowledge of HTML and Javascript. Knowledge of CSS can be an added advantage to make your extension more presentable but is not a necessary requirement.

We are always open to any query regarding our extension, please feel free to contact us.
